https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z9nPRD7PIx7dE5BqbYZKVlQawHs.jpg As the police launch a full-scale crackdown on organized crime, it ignites a national yakuza struggle between the Sanno of the East and Hanabishi of the West. What started as an internal strife in Outrage has now become a nationwide war in Outrage Beyond. Beyond Outrage
